titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation to forbid the subiects of the realme of England to haue any trade or commerce within any the dominions of the King of Spaine or the Archduchesse.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, Printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: "Giuen at His Maiesties Honour of Hampton Court, this 24. of December. 1625."
Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
